channel.title: Annoying problem
channel.description:
I know this isn't directly linked to RuneScape private servers, but I figured it's probably the only place I can get help.
When I logged into my VPS this morning, it logged onto it, but without the CMD window of run.bat, but my server is still online.
I've logged off, logged back on, and still when I press run.bat it says "server already in use".
I hope i've explained that well enough.
Thanks for your time,
- RuneX -

item.title: Annoying problem
item.dc:creator: @RuneX-Gaming RuneX-Gaming
item.description:
@RuneX-Gaming wrote:

It’s ok, there were just 17 players online, i’ve restarted the VPS, and now it won’t let me connect back onto it.

I’m so sad.

  • RuneX -[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 08, 2009, 09:14:39 am[/size][hr]Great, I just sorted it.

Thanks for your help too gl0wi.

  • RuneX -

Read full topic

item.title: Annoying problem
item.dc:creator: @RuneX-Gaming RuneX-Gaming
item.description:
@RuneX-Gaming wrote:

K mate, i’ll give it a go.

  • RuneX -[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 08, 2009, 08:53:31 am[/size][hr]Didn’t work when I tried to delete the old folder.

It said;

[code]Cannot delete bans.config: it is being used by another person or program.

Close any programs that might be using that file and try again.[/code]

I might just restart the VPS.

  • RuneX -

Read full topic
